title: DataParallel on list inputs
body_html:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/parallel/scatter_gather.py#L5
If your input is a list of two variables in which the first one has dimension 5 and the other 1.
This will create a single replica which only contains the first 3 batches of the first variable.
